September 8, 1967
Mr. Harry M, Brawley
Executive Secretary
West Virginia Educational Broadcasting Authority
1033 Quarrier Street
Room 701
Charleston, West Virginia
Dear Harry:
Thank you for writing to urge my support of the Public
Television Act of 1967
The Senate BUI. S 1160, passed the Senate on May 17,
as I'm sure you are aware. The House bill, HR 6736, has been reported
J a ___ i a nrt i c rV^finIP J
out of the Interstate and Foreign Commerce Committee, and is pending
in the Rules Committee,,

Ken Hechler.
